item.title: Lodge Lane car park litter problem continues, 23rd September
item.description:
Hi, I've reported the bad ongoing litter problem of Lodge Lane car park before. Here are some photos taken today, to illustrate this further. There is rubbish in several places, dotted all around the car park including the perimeter. I do hope something can be done. Daily cleaning and litter picking? Large bins for the public, emptied regularly?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Winifred Place, North Finchley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nasty Litter Build Up, 23rd September
item.description:
I know this narrow alley is controlled by Sainsbury's. I have also noticed they have cleaned up the first large planter near the main road. Could you ask them to clean up the second large planter near the betting shop & Sainsbury's entrance because as you can see from the picture, that planter has a bad litter issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Subject: Urgent Complaint Regarding Noise from Car Park Gates, 23rd September
item.description:
I am writing to urgently address the ongoing noise issue caused by the car park gates behind Eden House and on Penkford Street. Despite having submitted two complaints previously, no action has been taken to mitigate the noise. This noise is not only disruptive but also significantly affects my well-being, as I am unwell and at home all the time. The constant noise is inhumane and adds to my distress. When I approached the individuals responsible, I was advised to contact you directly. I kindly request that this matter be addressed as soon as possible to improve the situation. Thank you for your attention to this urgent matter. I look forward to your prompt response. Sincerely, Yasser Abdalla

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 89, Church Street, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tents and bedding dumped, 23rd September
item.description:

item.title: Blocked Drain, 23rd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Towncourt Crescent, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven pavement, 23rd September
item.description:
The ground is uneven which caused me to fall. I have an injured knee and bruised elbow. With the increased foot traffic due to the railway bridge being closed you have to step out of the way of oncoming people quite quickly on that corner and the uneven pavement caused my ankle to go over and I fell down.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Queensway, Petts Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
